content: 8/28 update i ve made some improvements to the pattern clearer armhole instructions sizing photos as well as a downloadable/printable version check it out if you haven t been by in a while inspired that s sweeping the yarn world this shawl/vest makes excellent use of this unique yarn s self striping quality this free pattern available on my blog steps up the granny triangle shawl by adding arm-holes so it can also be worn as a vest all you need is 2 caron cakes and a 6 5mm crochet hook also check out my other blog post on how to select the right caron cake for your project so you can get the desired striping pattern for this shawl or any project you make with this yarn
